mapper.select: select ab.AGENT_ID,aa.AG_NAME,ab.BUS_PLATFORM,ap.PLATFORM_NAME,ap.PLATFORM_TYPE from A_AGENT_BUSINFO ab inner join A_AGENT aa on ab.AGENT_ID = aa.ID inner join A_PLATFORM ap on ab.BUS_PLATFORM = ap.PLATFORM_NUM where ab.status=1 and ab.bus_status=1 and CLO_REVIEW_STATUS = 3 and ab.BUS_NUM = #{busNum}
